EmailTemplate.description: Used when a member needs their WGBH.org password reset
EmailTemplate.name: Form Letter - Web User and Password Reset
EmailTemplate.subject: Your WGBH.org Password Reset
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting WGBH Audience & Member Services. We’re sorry that you had difficulty logging into wgbh.org. We have passed your comments along to our website team and will keep your feedback in mind for our next redesign. We have reset your user name and password to allow you to log in. Please find instructions below to access your account. From the home page at wgbh.org, click “Login to My WGBH” at the top of the page. Enter the information below:
Username: {email address} Password: {new password} (case sensitive)
Click My WGBH in the top right corner. This will take you to your account manager. On the right side of the screen click “Edit my Profile”. When the edit window opens, enter a new password and confirm in the two lower fields. Click the green “continue” button to save.
This will allow you to access all of the WGBH online features. If you have specific questions about our website features, please contact us. Thank you for your support and please contact us with any questions, concerns, or feedback.
Sincerely, {!Case.OwnerFullName} WGBH Audience and Member Services
{!Case.CaseNumber}
